# Watershed Profiles

This page contains detailed profiles of watersheds important for Pacific salmon conservation.

## Overview

Watershed profiles provide comprehensive information about the physical, biological, and management characteristics of salmon-bearing watersheds.

## Watershed Categories

- Major river systems
- Coastal watersheds
- Urban watersheds
- Transboundary watersheds

## Profile Components

Each watershed profile includes:
- Physical characteristics
- Habitat conditions
- Species presence and abundance
- Conservation status
- Restoration activities
- Management considerations

## Interactive Maps

Links to interactive watershed mapping tools and resources.

## Resources

Access to detailed watershed assessments and supporting data.
